thread.title: Watch: Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt are down with Navratri frenzy
thread.title_full: Watch: Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt are down with Navratri frenzy

author: Deccan
title: Watch: Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt are down with Navratri frenzy
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 20, 2015, 16.10 pm Mumbai: Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt are leaving no stone unturned in promoting their upcoming film ‘Shaandaar’. The actors are extremely busy with the promotions but they doesn't stop them from having fun!
With festive season going on, Shahid and Alia are down with Navratri frenzy. Yes, during the promotions of their film, the stars came down to enjoy a garba night with their fans in Ahemdabad. Alia took to her official Instagram account to let her fans have a glimpse of the fun night that she had.
In the video, we see Shahid and Alia making the most of the garba night as they groove and shake in perfect desi style.
Garba nights in Ahemdabad!!!! #Shaandaar #ShaandaarPromotions
A video posted by Alia (@aliaabhatt) on Oct 19, 2015 at 12:39pm PDT
Directed by Vikas Bahl, 'Shaandaar' looks nothing less than a fairy tale with a desi touch. The story takes place in an exotic castle in Europe, where two biggest business families from India gather around for a business merger…. We mean, a big fat Indian “Shaandaar” wedding.
The release of ‘Shaandaar’ is just around the corner. The film hits the theatres on October 22, 2015.
